price: 52. Waxay (markay arkaan cadaabka Aakhiro) odhan: Waanu rumeynay (haatan). Sidee bayse qaadashada (Iimaanka) uga suura gali meel fog (inay u soo laabtaan noloshii adduunka)?
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلتَّنَاوُشُ مِن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqālū āmannā bihi wa-annā lahumu al-tanāwushu min makānin baʿīdin
